DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To compare impact tailor intervention v standard intervention v usual care patient utilization colorectal cancer ( CRC ) screening . - To compare impact intervention CRC screen preference . - To compare impact intervention patient perception CRC screen . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Participants stratify practice study wave block . Participants randomize 1 3 arm . - Arm I ( usual care ) : Participants receive usual care accordance normal pattern interaction study practice . - Arm II ( standard intervention [ SI ] ) : A generic screening invitation letter , colorectal cancer ( CRC ) screen informational booklet , stool blood testing ( SBT ) card , instruction arrange colonoscopy screen appointment mail participant day 15 . On day 45 , reminder letter mail participant complete SBT undergone screening colonoscopy . - Arm III ( tailor navigation intervention [ TNI ] ) : A test-specific screening invitation letter , CRC screen informational booklet , additional test-specific material ( i.e. , instruction arrange colonoscopy screen appointment SBT card ) mail participant day 15 . On day 30 , patient navigator contact participant telephone complete SBT undergone screen colonoscopy . The patient navigator re-assesses screen test-specific decision stage ; address CRC screen barrier ; develop personalize CRC screen plan move participant towards screen use ( i.e. , explain step complete SBT schedule colonoscopy appointment ) ; facilitate screen plan implementation . On day 45 , reminder letter mail participant contact navigator . Participants arm complete survey baseline 6 month . Medical record participant review 6 month .
